General.Name: XiAn Shaangu Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Xi'an Shaangu Power Co., Ltd. provides systematic solutions and services in the People's Republic of China. The company offers energy conversion turbine units, including air separation compressors, axial compressors, blast furnace power recovery turbines, centrifugal compressors, circulating hydrogen centrifugal compressors for hydrogenation and reforming units, industrial steam turbines, LNG compressor trains, natural gas long-distance pipeline compressors, nitric acia turbine units, shaangu liquefied natural gas compressors, sinter blower residual heat recovery turbines, and water vapor compressors. It also provides EPC, industrial, energy infrastructure operation, financial, supply chain, and intelligent services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Xi'an, the People's Republic of China. Xi'an Shaangu Power Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shaanxi Blower (Group) Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 8, South Fenghui Road, Xi'an, China, 710075
